comment.author: 60406173@N04
comment._content:
It's M. Codrington. - CO 525 Colonial Office: Nyasaland Original Correspondence
The Nyasaland railway system: criticisms by the Governor in letters to Mr M Codrington of Nyasaland Railways Ltd, and in a speech to the Legislative Council. Includes an article from The Nyasaland Times reporting the Governor's speech to the Legislative Council of 19 July 1940, and a further article from the same newspaper of 29 July 1940, reporting on a collision between two goods trains near Beira
